mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (BE.BNR_MENU_ID || '.' || BE.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID || '.' || BE.BNR_SEQ) AS BNR_ID, B.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD, B.BNR_INFO, BE.BNR_NM, BE.BG_COLOR_CD, BI.IMG_SIZE_CD, BI.IMG_PATH FROM TB_DP_BNR B JOIN TB_DP_BNR_EXPO BE ON B.TENANT_ID = BE.TENANT_ID AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = BE.BNR_MENU_ID AND B.BNR_SEQ = BE.BNR_SEQ JOIN TB_DP_BNR_IMG BI ON B.TENANT_ID = BI.TENANT_ID AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = BI.BNR_MENU_ID AND B.BNR_SEQ = BI.BNR_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = #{bnrMenuId} AND BI.IMG_SIZE_CD = #{imgSizeCd} AND BE.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID = #{bnrExpoMenuId} AND BE.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND BE.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BE.EXPO_STATUS_CD IN ('DP010201', 'DP010202') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN DECODE(BE.EXPO_STATUS_CD, 'DP010202', SYSDATE, BE.EXPO_START_DT) AND DECODE(BE.EXPO_STATUS_CD,'DP010202',SYSDATE, NVL(BE.EXPO_END_DT, SYSDATE)) ORDER BY BE.EXPO_ORD, BE.EXPO_ORD_SUB ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{count}
